meanings.definition: To convert (animal hide) into leather by soaking in a liquid containing tannic acid.
meanings.sent1: She tans the leather to make it strong.
meanings.sent2: The tannery tans the hides for making bags.
meanings.sent3: The leather tans in the solution, turning into a useful material.
meanings.sent4: The process tans the hide, transforming it into durable leather.
meanings.sent5: The tanning of the hide tans it into a sturdy material for crafting.

meanings.definition: A brown color obtained by exposure to the sun.
meanings.sent1: Her skin had a beautiful tan after the beach vacation.
meanings.sent2: The painting had a warm tan color that complemented the room.
meanings.sent3: The tan of the wood gave the room a cozy feeling.
meanings.sent4: The tan of the landscape under the setting sun was breathtaking.
meanings.sent5: The tan of the desert sand stretched endlessly under the clear sky.

meanings.definition: To become brown from exposure to the sun.
meanings.sent1: His skin tans easily during the summer.
meanings.sent2: The paint on the house tans over time due to sunlight.
meanings.sent3: The bread tans quickly in the hot oven, just like skin in the sun.
meanings.sent4: The leaves tans in the autumn sun, changing colors beautifully.
meanings.sent5: The paper tans under the bright light, turning a golden hue.
